changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE courses( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, title VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, author VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, publish_date DATE NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_id PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE transactions( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, course_id BIGINT NOT NULL, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, date_of_issue DATETIME, CONSTRAINT pk_id PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT fk_tran_course FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES courses(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );
